Namespace DotFeather

クラス

ALBuffer

OpenAl のバッファハンドルを System.IDisposable でラッピングします。

ALSource

AL のソースハンドルを System.IDisposable でラッピングします。

AnimatingSprite

A sprite with texture-animation feature.

AudioPlayer

Provides audio source playback functionality.

Container

他の IDrawable オブジェクトを格納し、相対位置に描画するオブジェクトです。

Coroutine class.

CoroutineExtension

A static coroutine manager class.

An audio source to generate waveform with delegate.

DFEventArgs

A basic event arguments.

DFFileDroppedEventArgs

Arguments for file-dropped-event.

DFKey

Represents a keyboard key.

DFKeyboard

Class that determines whether a key on the keyboard is pressed. This class can not be inherited.

DFKeyEventArgs

Keyboard event argument.

DFKeyPressEventArgs

Keyboard pressed event argument.

DFMath

便利な数学系メソッドを提供します。

DFMouse

This class gets the mouse cursor position, mouse button status, etc. This class can not be inherited.

DFSynchronizationContext

Font

Depresents font-family, size, and font style.

GameBase

DotFeather のメインループおよび、各種メソッドを揃えている、ゲームエントリーポイントの基底クラスです。

Graphic

This is a graphic layer to draw shapes.

MiscUtility

その他の便利な静的メソッドを提供します。

NineSliceSprite

A IDrawable object to draw 9-slice sprite.

RandomExtension

Router

Scene Management class.

RoutingGameBase<T>

Scene

Abstract scene class.

SpaceConverter

Sprite

A IDrawable object to draw a texture.

StringExtension

TextDrawable

A IDrawable object to render text.

TextureDrawableBase

An abstract class for objects that draw a Texture2D.

TextureDrawer

Texture2D オブジェクトをバッファ上に描画する機能を提供します。

Tile

画像ファイルを表示するタイルです。

Tilemap

A IDrawable object to render ITile objects in a lattice.

Time

Provides time related information.

TypesConverterExtension

DotFeather および 間における類似した型の相互変換をする、拡張メソッドを追加します。

VorbisAudioSource

An audio source that represents data in Ogg Vorbis format.

WaitForSeconds

A yield instruction that waits for a specified number of seconds.

WaitForTask

WaitUntil

A yield instruction that keeps waiting until the specified condition is met.

WaitUntilNextFrame

A yield instruction to wait until the next frame.

WaitWhile

A yield instruction that keeps waiting while the specified condition is met.

WaveAudioSource

An audio source that represents the Wave file format.

YieldInstruction

A base yield instructions class that control coroutine waits.
